root.name: Pamoja Mtaani
root.description: IntroductionPamoja Mtaan is a game that follows the stories of 5 strangers who all lost a precious object. Its up to the players to reclaim these stolen objects by doing various missions and mini games that have for aim to make the player reflect on how to handle such situations in real life. Pamoja Mtaan is develloped bu Virtual Heroes and published by Warner Interactive.TriviaPamoja Mtaani roughly translates to "together in the hood"
